alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 4:23PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong cluster of thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern White Pine and southeastern Elko Counties through 500 PM PDT... At 420 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong cluster of thunderstorms extending from Ruby Lake to Currie, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Currie, Ruby Lake, Harrison Pass and Franklin Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County
